archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0267
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, making a purchase that involves delivery/pickup of products and services, I want to be able to view what delivery/pickup options are available including how much it will cost and how long it will take, so that I can choose the option that best suits.

properties.value: Delivery options to be discussed. What exactly do they base on (area? exact location etc). Time of delivery is fixed per method or dynamic? Some options may not be available based on delivery address (for example a shop is too far). This is seen as a set of a few basic rules set in Comarch. Requirement REQ_BSS_0043 is linked to this one. Time of delivery most likely will be fixed.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
